cause.description:
On July 17, 2007 which will be 07/17/07 people from around the world will gather at a place that is special to them, with family and friends, meditating, whatever makes you happy. For this hour which starts at 11:11, transfered into 8:41 am NL time, spend it being aware of your very being. The purpose is to raise global consiousness. If you would like more information check out the website www.firethegrid.com for the story the problem and the plan...what is one hour of your time for the good of man kind which includes you and your loved ones
1. World Peace
2. Awakening
3. Higher energy levels
cause.name: World Peace
